## Trick Chaining/Multi Air Tricks (Like Mario Kart World)

This code allows you to chain tricks in the air (trick multiple times), just like Mario Kart World. 

You can only chain tricks if you have sucessfully tricked before trying to chain. You can turn for a few frames after tricking and the trick types are ramp types, where you can rotate sideways or forward/backward

<details>
<summary>NTSC-U</summary>

```powerpc
0456F2FC 70000001
0456F370 4800000C
04573DD0 60000000
C256F2F0 00000002
88A3003A 7CA62B78
60000000 00000000
C256F330 0000000E
80A4001C 81630004
816B0008 71608040
41820050 899F00DB
398C0001 2C0C001E
40800008 999F00DB
7CC53378 2C0C0014
40800008 38A00000
2C050000 4182002C
39800001 91840074
81830004 818C0008
718C0400 4082000C
39800005 9184001C
39800000 999F00DB
60000000 00000000
```
</details>
